body: This is cool and all but I need a continuation of the story where the gyaru-oh is fucking that girl behind the boyfriend's back. Impregnation scene and all.
The artstyle is so fucking hot, and the FMC is so sexy. Can't wait for the translation.
This is so fucking hot! Can't wait for translation.
@Khrysostamos thanks for the info now im confused af
Taking the pills and it being a dangerous day was serious, especially with the last page hints to it.

Translated a bit near the end, apparently he divorced his wife (not so sure about this, but he is having an affair). Spent the entire summer having sex, during their last one, she says she’s forgotten to take pills and that’s it’s a dangerous day for her. Commence le baby making seggs, boner dialogue like she’s conceived etc. After they finish, she says she needs to study for an exam, she’s going to college, and if he still likes her next summer and contact her again, she’ll consider going their future together(?). Last panel, the mc is doubting his experience with her, how much of it was real, how much of it was fake, was she just playing around with him (him going onto a train or bus leaving the village). She calls out to him, tells him to break up with his wife early, since if she’s pregnant (her or him) would push to recognize it(?), and that would be a big deal. Is she pregnant, from what I can tell and my perspective yea, she’s playing around with him but the part about her not-
